TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DllImportAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DllImportAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DllImportAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指出由 Unmanaged 動態連結程式庫 (DLL) 公開做為靜態進入點的屬性化方法。

span.span: Indicates that the attributed method is exposed by an unmanaged dynamic-link library (DLL) as a static entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至方法中。You can apply this attribute to methods. 屬性會提供呼叫從 unmanaged DLL 匯出的函式所需的資訊。The attribute provides the information needed to call a function exported from an unmanaged DLL. 最小需求，您必須提供包含進入點的 dll 名稱。As a minimum requirement, you must supply the name of the DLL containing the entry point. 此屬性直接套用到 C# 和 c + + 方法的定義;不過，Visual Basic 編譯器會發出這個屬性使用時`Declare`陳述式。You apply this attribute directly to C# and C++ method definitions; however, the Visual Basic compiler emits this attribute when you use the `Declare` statement. 如需包含複雜的方法定義， ， ， ， ，或欄位，這個屬性直接套用到 Visual Basic 方法定義。For complex method definitions that include , , , , , or fields, you apply this attribute directly to Visual Basic method definitions. **請注意**JScript 不支援這個屬性。**Note** JScript does not support this attribute. 若要從 JScript 程式存取未受管理的 API 方法，您可以使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 包裝函式類別。You can use C# or Visual Basic wrapper classes to access unmanaged API methods from JScript programs. 如需有關使用平台叫用服務來存取 unmanaged Dll 中的函式，請參閱 < [ 使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For additional information about using the platform invoke service to access functions in unmanaged DLLs, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). > [!NOTE] > 不支援封送處理泛型型別。The does not support marshaling of generic types. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以匯入 Win32`MessageBox`函式。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 程式碼範例接著會呼叫匯入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dllName) cil managed

param.name: dllName
param.span: 包含 Unmanaged 方法的 DLL 名稱。

span.span: The name of the DLL that contains the unmanaged method.

param.span: 如果 DLL 包含在組件中，這個名稱可能會包括組件顯示名稱。

span.span: This can include an assembly display name, if the DLL is included in an assembly.

summary.span: 使用含有要匯入方法的 DLL 名稱，來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the DLL containing the method to import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 unmanaged 的 DLL 檔案中包含組件，例如，藉由使用連結器或`/linkresource`編譯器選項時，您可以指定組件顯示名稱的一部分`dllName`。If an unmanaged DLL file is included in an assembly, for example, by using the linker or the `/linkresource` compiler option, you can specify the assembly display name as part of `dllName`. 例如，如果名為 unmanaged DLL`unmanaged.dll`包含在名為 managed 組件`MyAssembly`，可能會指定屬性，如下列程式碼所示。For example, if an unmanaged DLL named `unmanaged.dll` is included in a managed assembly named `MyAssembly`, the attribute might be specified as shown in the following code. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以匯入 Win32`MessageBox`函式。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 程式碼範例接著會呼叫匯入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將 Unicode 字元轉換成 ANSI 字元時，啟用或停用最適合對應行為。

span.span: Enables or disables best-fit mapping behavior when converting Unicode characters to ANSI characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`true`、 最適合對應行為啟用; 否則自動調整對應已停用。If `true`, best-fit mapping behavior is enabled; otherwise, best-fit mapping is disabled. 欄位是`true`預設。The field is `true` by default. 此欄位的設定會覆寫的任何層級設定屬性。Settings for this field override the any level settings for the attribute. Common language runtime 會將任何受管理傳遞給 unmanaged 的方法執行，在 Windows 98 或 Windows me 上的 Unicode 字元的 ANSI 字元The common language runtime converts to ANSI characters any managed Unicode characters passed to an unmanaged method executing on Windows 98 or Windows Me. 自動調整的對應可讓提供關閉比對的字元完全相符項目存在時，interop 封送處理器。Best-fit mapping enables the interop marshaler to provide a close-matching character when no exact match exists. 比方說，封送處理器著作權將 Unicode 字元轉換為 'c' 接受 ANSI 字元的 unmanaged 方法。For example, the marshaler converts the Unicode copyright character to 'c' for unmanaged methods that accept ANSI characters. 某些字元缺少的自動調整的表示法;這些字元稱為無法對應。Some characters lack a best-fit representation; these characters are called unmappable. 無法對應的字元通常會轉換成預設值 '？ 'ANSI 字元。Unmappable characters are usually converted to the default '?' ANSI character. > [!CAUTION] > 某些 Unicode 字元都轉換成危險的字元，例如反斜線 '\\' 字元，可以不小心變更路徑。Certain Unicode characters are converted to dangerous characters, such as the backslash '\\' character, which can inadvertently change a path. 藉由設定欄位設為`true`，您可以藉由擲回例外狀況通知呼叫端無法對應的字元是否存在。By setting the field to `true`, you can signal the presence of an unmappable character to the caller by throwing an exception. > [!CAUTION] > 您無法變更所提供的預設值和欄位傳遞 managed 的陣列的項目不是 ANSI 字元就 LPSTRs 到未受管理的安全陣列。You cannot change the default values provided by the and fields when passing a managed array whose elements are ANSI Chars or LPSTRs to an unmanaged safe array. 永遠啟用自動調整的對應，而且會擲回任何例外狀況。Best-fit mapping is always enabled and no exception is thrown. 請注意這種組合可能會危害您的安全性模型。Be aware that this combination can compromise your security model. ## Examples 在某些情況下，使用 Visual Basic 開發人員，而不是`Declare`陳述式，以定義在 managed 程式碼的 DLL 函式。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 設定欄位是其中一種情況。Setting the field is one of those cases. 下列範例示範如何將套用最精確指定 ANSI 字元集、 停用最適合的對應行為，並擲回例外狀況未對應的 Unicode 字元的字元對應安全性平台叫用的方法定義。The following example shows how to apply the strictest character mapping security to a platform invoke method definitions by specifying the ANSI character set, disabling best fit mapping behavior, and throwing an exception on unmapped Unicode characters. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

summary.span: 指示進入點的呼叫慣例。

span.span: Indicates the calling convention of an entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您將此欄位設定為其中一個列舉型別成員。You set this field to one of the enumeration members. 預設值欄位是，因而會預設以慣例。The default value for the field is , which in turn defaults to convention. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的呼叫慣例。For more information, see Calling Convention in the MSDN library. ## Examples 在某些情況下，使用 Visual Basic 開發人員，而不是`Declare`陳述式，以定義在 managed 程式碼的 DLL 函式。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 設定欄位是其中一種情況。Setting the field is one of those cases. System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#1System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#1

summary.span: 指示如何將字串參數封送處理到方法和控制項函式名稱改變 (Name Mangling)。

span.span: Indicates how to marshal string parameters to the method and controls name mangling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此欄位的成員列舉指定的字串參數封送處理行為，並指定要叫用 （提供的確切名稱或名稱，結尾"A"或"W"） 的進入點名稱。Use this field with a member of the enumeration to specify the marshaling behavior of string parameters and to specify which entry-point name to invoke (the exact name given or a name ending with "A" or "W"). 預設列舉成員，C# 和 Visual Basic 就`CharSet.Ansi`c + + 的預設列舉成員，而且`CharSet.None`，這相當於`CharSet.Ansi`。The default enumeration member for C# and Visual Basic is `CharSet.Ansi` and the default enumeration member for C++ is `CharSet.None`, which is equivalent to `CharSet.Ansi`. 在 Visual Basic 中，您可以使用`Declare`陳述式來指定`CharSet`欄位。In Visual Basic, you use the `Declare` statement to specify the `CharSet` field. 欄位會影響行為的`CharSet`欄位判斷要叫用哪一個進入點名稱。The field influences the behavior of the `CharSet` field in determining which entry-point name to invoke. 詳細的描述和封送處理字串和名稱比對行為相關聯的範例`CharSet`欄位中，請參閱 < [ 指定字元集](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-a-character-set.md)。For a detailed description and examples of the string marshaling and name matching behavior associated with the `CharSet` field, see [Specifying a Character Set](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-a-character-set.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以匯入 Win32`MessageBox`函式。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 程式碼範例接著會呼叫匯入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示要呼叫的 DLL 進入點 (Entry Point) 的名稱或序數。

span.span: Indicates the name or ordinal of the DLL entry point to be called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由提供表示包含進入點的 dll 名稱的字串中指定的進入點名稱，或您可以根據其序數識別進入點。You can specify the entry-point name by supplying a string indicating the name of the DLL containing the entry point, or you can identify the entry point by its ordinal. 序數會加上 # 符號，例如，#1。Ordinals are prefixed with the # sign, for example, #1. 如果您省略此欄位時，common language runtime 會使用以標記的.net 方法的名稱。If you omit this field, the common language runtime uses the name of the.NET method marked with the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[用來識別 Dll 中函式](~/docs/framework/interop/identifying-functions-in-dlls.md)。For additional information, see [Identifying Functions in DLLs](~/docs/framework/interop/identifying-functions-in-dlls.md). 如需範例示範如何使用欄位中，請參閱 < [ 指定進入點](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-an-entry-point.md)。For examples showing how to use the field, see [Specifying an Entry Point](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-an-entry-point.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以匯入 Win32`MessageBox`函式。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 此程式碼範例會使用屬性來指定要匯入的函式，然後將名稱變更為`MyNewMessageBoxMethod`。The code example uses the property to specify the function to import and then changes the name to `MyNewMessageBoxMethod`. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 控制 欄位是否會導致 Common Language Runtime 搜尋 Unmanaged DLL 以取得不是指定名稱的進入點名稱。

span.span: Controls whether the field causes the common language runtime to search an unmanaged DLL for entry-point names other than the one specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`false`，加上字母 A 的進入點名稱會叫用時欄位設定為`CharSet.Ansi`，並叫用進入點名稱加上字母 W 時欄位設定為`CharSet.Unicode`。If `false`, the entry point name appended with the letter A is invoked when the field is set to `CharSet.Ansi`, and the entry-point name appended with the letter W is invoked when the field is set to the `CharSet.Unicode`. 一般來說，managed 的編譯器會設定此欄位。Typically, managed compilers set this field. 下表顯示之間的關聯性和的程式設計語言所加諸的預設值為基礎的欄位。The following table shows the relationship between the and fields, based on default values imposed by the programming language. 您可以覆寫預設設定，但這樣做時請小心。You can override the default setting, but do so with caution. |語言Language|ANSIANSI|UnicodeUnicode|自動Auto| |--------------|----------|-------------|----------| |Visual BasicVisual Basic|ExactSpelling:=TrueExactSpelling:=True|ExactSpelling:=TrueExactSpelling:=True|ExactSpelling:=FalseExactSpelling:=False| |C#C#|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false| |C++C++|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false| ## Examples 在某些情況下，使用 Visual Basic 開發人員，而不是使用`Declare`陳述式，以定義在 managed 程式碼的 DLL 函式。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 設定欄位是其中一種情況。Setting the field is one of those cases. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 指出是否直接轉譯具有 或 傳回值的 Unmanaged 方法，或者是否將 或 傳回值自動轉換成例外狀況。

span.span: Indicates whether unmanaged methods that have or return values are directly translated or whether or return values are automatically converted to exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定欄位設為`true`直接轉換使用的 unmanaged 簽章`HRESULT`或是`retval`值，將它設定為`false`將自動轉換`HRESULT`或`retval`例外狀況的值。Set the field to `true` to directly translate unmanaged signatures with `HRESULT` or `retval` values; set it to `false` to automatically convert `HRESULT` or `retval` values to exceptions. 根據預設，欄位是`true`。By default, the field is `true`. 當`true`，產生的方法簽章傳回整數值，其中包含`HRESULT`值。When `true`, the resulting method signature returns an integer value that contains the `HRESULT` value. 在此情況下，您必須以手動方式檢查傳回的值，並據以回應應用程式中。In this case, you must manually inspect the return value and respond accordingly in your application. 當您設定欄位設為`false`，產生的方法簽章含有 void 的傳回型別，而不是整數 (`HRESULT`) 傳回型別。When you set the field to `false`, the resulting method signature contains a void return type instead of an integer (`HRESULT`) return type. 當 unmanaged 的方法會產生`HRESULT`，執行階段會自動忽略傳回值為`S_OK`（或 0） 和不擲回例外狀況。When the unmanaged method produces an `HRESULT`, the runtime automatically ignores a return value of `S_OK` (or 0) and does not throw an exception. 針對`HRESULT`以外的 s `S_OK`，執行階段會自動擲回例外狀況對應至`HRESULT`。For `HRESULT`s other than `S_OK`, the runtime automatically throws an exception that corresponds to the `HRESULT`. 請注意，屬性只會執行這項轉換方法會傳回`HRESULT`。Note that the attribute only performs this conversion to methods that return an `HRESULT`. 若要變更預設的錯誤報告的行為，您可能會決定`HRESULT`s 例外狀況更適合的錯誤報告應用程式結構的案例中的例外狀況。You might decide to change the default error reporting behavior from `HRESULT`s to exceptions in cases where exceptions better fit the error reporting structure of your application. 這個欄位是類似; 不過，相對於欄位中，預設值為屬性`false`。This field is similar to the ; however, in contrast to the field, the default value for the attribute is `false`. 在某些情況下，使用 Visual Basic 開發人員，而不是使用`Declare`陳述式，以定義在 managed 程式碼的 DLL 函式。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 設定欄位是其中一種情況。Setting the field is one of those cases. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用匯入 unmanaged`SHAutoComplete`函式一次與欄位設定為`true`，再欄位設定為`false`。The following code example uses the to import the unmanaged `SHAutoComplete` function once with the field set to `true` and again with the field set to `false`. 下列程式碼範例會導致`SHAutoComplete`函式來產生任何錯誤，並一次發生例外狀況和`HRESULT`下一步。This code example causes the `SHAutoComplete` function to generate any errors with an exception one time and an `HRESULT` the next. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute/vb/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示自屬性方法傳回之前，被呼叫端是否呼叫 Win32 應用程式開發介面函式。

span.span: Indicates whether the callee calls the Win32 API function before returning from the attributed method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 表示被呼叫者會呼叫`SetLastError`; 否則`false`。`true` to indicate that the callee will call `SetLastError`; otherwise, `false`. 預設為 `false`。The default is `false`. 執行階段會封送處理器呼叫`GetLastError`並快取以避免遭到覆寫其他 API 呼叫傳回的值。The runtime marshaler calls `GetLastError` and caches the value returned to prevent it from being overwritten by other API calls. 您可以藉由呼叫擷取錯誤碼。You can retrieve the error code by calling . ## Examples 在某些情況下，使用 Visual Basic 開發人員，而不是使用`Declare`陳述式，以定義在 managed 程式碼的 DLL 函式。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 設定欄位是其中一種情況。Setting the field is one of those cases. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#5)]

summary.span: 在無法對應的 Unicode 字元轉換為 ANSI "?" 字元時，啟用或停用例外狀況的擲回。

span.span: Enables or disables the throwing of an exception on an unmappable Unicode character that is converted to an ANSI "?" character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 表示發生例外狀況時，interop 封送處理器會將轉換無法對應的字元; 每次`false`表示會停用欄位。`true` to indicate that an exception is thrown each time the interop marshaler converts an unmappable character; `false` to indicate that the field is disabled. 這個欄位是`false`預設。This field is `false` by default. Common language runtime 會將任何受管理傳遞給 unmanaged 的方法執行，在 Windows 98 或 Windows me 上的 Unicode 字元的 ANSI 字元The common language runtime converts to ANSI characters any managed Unicode characters passed to an unmanaged method executing on Windows 98 or Windows Me. 自動調整的對應可讓提供關閉比對的字元完全相符項目存在時，interop 封送處理器。Best-fit mapping enables the interop marshaler to provide a close-matching character when no exact match exists. 比方說，封送處理器著作權將 Unicode 字元轉換為 'c' 接受 ANSI 字元的 unmanaged 方法。For example, the marshaler converts the Unicode copyright character to 'c' for unmanaged methods that accept ANSI characters. 某些字元缺少的自動調整的表示法;這些字元稱為無法對應。Some characters lack a best-fit representation; these characters are called unmappable. 無法對應的字元通常會轉換成預設值 '？ 'ANSI 字元。Unmappable characters are usually converted to the default '?' ANSI character. > [!CAUTION] > 某些 Unicode 字元都轉換成危險的字元，例如反斜線 '\\' 字元，可以不小心變更路徑。Certain Unicode characters are converted to dangerous characters, such as the backslash '\\' character, which can inadvertently change a path. 藉由設定欄位設為`true`，您可以藉由擲回例外狀況通知呼叫端無法對應的字元是否存在。By setting the field to `true`, you can signal the presence of an unmappable character to the caller by throwing an exception. > [!CAUTION] > 您無法變更所提供的預設值和欄位傳遞 managed 的陣列的項目不是 ANSI 字元就 LPSTRs 到未受管理的安全陣列。You cannot change the default values provided by the and fields when passing a managed array whose elements are ANSI Chars or LPSTRs to an unmanaged safe array. 永遠啟用自動調整的對應，而且會擲回任何例外狀況。Best-fit mapping is always enabled and no exception is thrown. 請注意這種組合可能會危害您的安全性模型。Be aware that this combination can compromise your security model. ## Examples 在某些情況下，使用 Visual Basic 開發人員定義在 managed 程式碼，而不是使用中的 DLL 函式`Declare`陳述式。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the to define a DLL function in managed code, instead of using the `Declare` statement. 設定欄位是其中一種情況。Setting the field is one of those cases. 下列範例示範如何將套用最精確指定 ANSI 字元集、 停用最適合的對應行為，並擲回例外狀況未對應的 Unicode 字元的字元對應安全性平台叫用的方法定義。The following example shows how to apply the strictest character mapping security to a platform invoke method definitions by specifying the ANSI character set, disabling best fit mapping behavior, and throwing an exception on unmapped Unicode characters. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含進入點的 DLL 檔案名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the DLL file that contains the entry point.

value.span: 包含進入點的 DLL 檔案名稱。

span.span: The name of the DLL file that contains the entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以提供完整或相對路徑。You can provide a full or relative path. 如果您不提供任何路徑，DLL 必須是目前路徑中在執行階段，除非以其他方式載入 DLL。If you provide no path, the DLL must be in the current path at run time, unless the DLL is loaded by some other means. 請注意，不過，使用完整的路徑可能會造成不正確的地方如果 DLL 被移動。Be aware, however, that using a fully qualified path can introduce inaccuracy if the DLL is moved.
